title: The day I turned down Tim Berners-Lee
description: Imagine it's late 1990, and you've just met a nice young man named Tim Berners-Lee, who starts telling you about his proposed system called the World Wide Web. Ian Ritchie was there. And ... he didn't buy it. A short story about information, connectivity and learning from mistakes.
author: Ian Ritchie
keywords: TED, talks, business, history, technology, web
